name: Eyescream
detailed_description:
Eyescream is a tough physics platformer that screams to save your eye. What is life without care about something you value most and that fear of losing it that comes with it?

You’re about to start an emotional adventure like none before, full of hope and disappointment, yet the outcome relies on your skills to save your precious friends and their friends' friends’ friends.

Ramping up difficulty from eye caring to first date nightmare Eyescream will drag your eyes through swamps, shoe shining paste factory, castle of evil Dr. J and furnace of souls.

Keep an eye out for this one!

  • 3 game modes
  • 83 levels
  • dozens of Achievements
  • 16 unlockable characters
  • Epic Boss fights

You’re about to start an emotional adventure like none before, full of hope and disappointment. Keep an eye out!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 4 years (Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
